text: The Wayward Bus is a 1957 American drama movie directed by Victor Vicas and was based on the 1947 novel of the same name by John Steinbeck. It stars Joan Collins, Jayne Mansfield, Dan Dailey, Rick Jason and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1957 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: The Wayward Bus (movie)
